subject: Figure Skating
Olympic Games (2006)
Olympic Games (2010)
lead_paragraph: Emily Hughes, a fill-in for Michelle Kwan at the 2006 Turin Olympics, will replace the injured Sasha Cohen at this week’s Skate America.
